Get ESPN's WNBA team box data

Source: R/espn_wnba_data.R
espn_wnba_team_box.Rd

Get ESPN's WNBA team box data

Usage

espn_wnba_team_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

Returns a team boxscore data frame

Team

Examples


# \donttest{
   try(espn_wnba_team_box(game_id = 401244185))
